messages.subject: Herbert Bix's _Hirohito_
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I remember a while back that there was some discussion about the merits of the book _Hirohito_ as opposed to some other book (whose title escapes me).
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I remember a while back that there was some discussion about the merits of
the book _Hirohito_ as opposed to some other book (whose title escapes me).
In any event, I thought that the list may be interested in this review of
the book. I have not had the time to read it myself, yet, but thought I
would post it for anyone who has some time and interest.

http://www.japanecho.co.jp/sum/2002/2906_bix_reprint.pdf


Cheers,

Shannon
